mapper.select: SELECT start_time, end_time FROM overtime_approval WHERE requester_id = #{requesterId} AND approval_status = "A" AND cancel_yn = "N" AND cancel_document_id = 0 AND (STR_TO_DATE(start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') BETWEEN #{sunday} AND #{saturday});

SELECT id, start_time, end_time, content, approval_status, write_time, cancel_yn, cancel_document_id, requester_id FROM bt_approval WHERE approval_status = 'A' AND cancel_yn = 'N' AND cancel_document_id = 0
